name: root
description: React component for showing carousel just like a film strip

scripts.build: npm run build:babel && concurrently --names="bundle,playground" "npm run build:bundle" "npm run build:playground"
scripts.start: npm run build:babel && concurrently --kill-others --names "babel,bundle,server" "npm run start:babel" "npm run start:bundle" "npm run start:server"
